name: Potion Miscibility

entries.result: Both potions lose their effects, and the mixture creates a magical explosion in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on itself; each creature in the area takes 4d10 force damage.
Both potions lose their effects, and the mixture becomes an ingested poison of your choice.
Both potions work, but numerical effects and durations are halved; if a potion has no numerical effect or duration, it instead loses its effect.
Both potions work, but one potion's numerical effects and duration are doubled; if neither has anything to double, they work normally.
Only one potion works, but its effect becomes permanent; choose the simplest or most fun effect, and allow Dispel Magic or similar magic to end it at your discretion.

notes: If more than two potions are mixed, roll again for each additional potion and combine the results.
